lines.name: Atziri's Acuity

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Life and Mana from Leech instantly on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText: "The heart is the herald. |It will tell me when it is best to strike."|- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Demigod's Dominance
lines.flavourText: The victorious know only leadership,|the rest only servitude.

lines.name: The Rat Cage

explicitModifiers.text: 10% of Fire Damage taken as Physical Damage

lines.flavourText: The truth lies inside every man, if you dig around. |Many a confession was found in the bowels of Axiom.

lines.name: Demigod's Dominance
lines.flavourText: #4 Champion in the Hardcore Perandus Flashback Event

lines.name: Skyforth

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to gain a Power Charge on Critical Strike
Stun Threshold is based on 500% of your Mana instead of Life

lines.flavourText: The quick die young, the brilliant go mad,|and the powerful stand alone in a wasteland of their own creation.

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour
lines.flavourText: "When you have nothing to hide,|you have nothing to fear."|- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Dialla's Malefaction

explicitModifiers.text: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +1 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +10% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 25% increased Experience

lines.flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.|But I did not do it for power.|I did it for love.|And I'd do it again in an instant.

lines.name: Death's Oath

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You take 450 Chaos Damage per second for 3 seconds on Kill

lines.flavourText: Tears of blood, aching heart,|My dear Isildria must depart.

lines.name: Tukohama's Fortress

explicitModifiers.text: Can have up to 1 additional Totem summoned at a time

lines.flavourText: Tukohama couldn't lose a fight in his fortress,|So he carried his fortress to the fight.

Socketed Gems are Supported by level 30 Generosity

(10-15)% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras you Cast

lines.flavourText: "Every life is a story.|If you're not writing your own,|you'd better know who's writing it for you!"|- Victario, the People's Poet

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
15% of Fire Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
25% increased Spell Damage taken when on Low Mana

lines.flavourText: Despair hums, softly, deadly, in the bones of my enemies. |Eyes will burn, and souls wither, as they bask in my radiance.

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour
lines.flavourText: "When you have nothing to hide,|you have nothing to fear."|- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.flavourText: Shavronne's apparel became ever more extravagant|as her body and soul became ever more corrupted.

lines.flavourText: Reap what others have sown|Muster them from their graves|Parade them for your pleasure|Zealots in mortis enslaved

lines.flavourText: "When you have nothing to hide,|you have nothing to fear."|- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.flavourText: Forget your kite shield. Just put the biggest man| in the field between you and the archers.

lines.flavourText: Renowned by those distinguished,|Exalted by the few.|He skulks in darkness, |and watches from beneath the city.

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (50-60) to (70-80) Cold Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText: Hyrri loosed a barrage of arrows,|tipped with a poisoned hatred|only oppression can ferment.

lines.name: Icetomb
lines.flavourText: When Solaris closes his burning eye|At the end of time,|the world will perish in ice.

lines.flavourText: Feed a beast and it will not hunt.|Protect it and it will not fight.|Ferocity must be learned, not taught.|It is suffering that forges the greatest warriors.

lines.name: Soul Mantle

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 20 Spell Totem
Can have up to 1 additional Totem summoned at a time
Inflicts a random level 20 Curse on you when your Totems die

lines.flavourText: The greatest mistakes cause suffering |long after they have been made

lines.name: The Perfect Form

explicitModifiers.text: Evasion Rating is increased by Uncapped Cold Resistance

lines.flavourText: We share one space,|speak one voice,|act through one body.|A flawless crystal.|Brittle.

lines.name: Belly of the Beast
lines.flavourText: There is no safer place|Than the Belly of the Beast

lines.name: Incandescent Heart

explicitModifiers.text: (0.8-1)% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain (10-20)% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
25% of Elemental Damage taken as Chaos Damage
Light Radius is based on Energy Shield instead of Life

lines.flavourText: Only light may banish the shadows from this land|And the black lies wrapped around your heart

lines.name: Lioneye's Vision

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Pierce
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText: "The Virtue Gems are a gift from the land, |our land, and we will not let our gifts|be destroyed by savages."|- Marceus Lioneye

lines.name: Geofri's Sanctuary
lines.flavourText: Faith does not make us invulnerable.|It makes us immortal.

lines.name: Queen of the Forest

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Movement Speed per 450 Evasion Rating
(-50--40) Physical Damage taken when Hit by Animals

lines.flavourText: Shedding away her regal past, |she forged a new destiny. |Sacrificing the ephemeral joys of man, |she embraced the eternal grasp of nature. |Seizing her one true wish, |she found peace at last.

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour
lines.flavourText: "When you have nothing to hide,|you have nothing to fear."|- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Carcass Jack

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Area of Effect of Area Skills

lines.flavourText: "...The discomfort shown by the others is amusing, but none|can deny that my work has made quite the splash..."|- Maligaro's Journal

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour
lines.flavourText: "When you have nothing to hide,|you have nothing to fear."|- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Cloak of Defiance

explicitModifiers.text: 10% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life

lines.flavourText: When the throat roars,|As eyes weep,|When the hand grips hard|With trembling fingers,|When belly twists|Yet legs stand strong,|That is the work|Of the Defiant Heart.

lines.name: Greed's Embrace
lines.flavourText: Some would question if the risk was worth it.|The rest were already dead.

lines.name: Kingsguard

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100 Life when an Endurance Charge expires or is consumed

lines.flavourText: The toughest armour is the trust of your people.

lines.name: Kintsugi

explicitModifiers.text: 20% less Damage taken if you have not been Hit Recently
50% increased Evasion Rating if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText: Do not hide your flaws, your cracks,|mend them, and display them proudly.|For it is these that set us apart.

lines.name: Rigwald's Quills

explicitModifiers.text: +7 Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks

lines.flavourText: The fortunate inscribe their legacy|in the pages of history books.|The rest of us must leave our mark with our blood|or the blood of others.

lines.name: The Brass Dome

explicitModifiers.text: 30% reduced Chance to Block Attacks and Spells
Take no Extra Damage from Critical Strikes

lines.flavourText: The turtle's shell one day becomes its tomb.

lines.name: The Restless Ward

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
(20.3-29.7) Life Regenerated per second per Endurance Charge
100% increased Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText: Use the dead to stave off death,|An armour of bones and rot.|Hanging on with bated breath,|One lapse and all for naught.

lines.name: Dendrobate

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Lesser Poison
(75-100)% increased Damage with Poison if you have at least 300 Dexterity
(16-25)% increased Poison Duration at least 150 Intelligence
(15-25)% increased Poison Duration if you have at least 150 Intelligence

lines.flavourText: Ask any tracker and they'll tell you:|the most dangerous animals|are the ones who don't bother to hide.

lines.name: Gruthkul's Pelt
lines.flavourText: Simple is the life of the bear.

lines.name: Cherrubim's Maleficence
lines.flavourText: "The Consort of Chaos descended,|swiftly, brutally, artfully, she consumed the living,|leaving naught behind but a Rosemarie bloom,|to celebrate the massacre."|- Blass, explorer, hunter, adventurer

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour
lines.flavourText: "When you have nothing to hide,|you have nothing to fear."|- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Tinkerskin

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Cooldown Recovery Speed for throwing Traps
15% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
30% chance to gain Phasing for 4 seconds when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
Recover 100 Life when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy
Recover 50 Energy Shield when your Trap is triggered by an Enemy

lines.flavourText: Thin is the line between mechanical genius and magic.

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour

explicitModifiers.text: (272-340)% increased Armour, Evasion and Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: "When you have nothing to hide,|you have nothing to fear."|- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Daresso's Defiance

explicitModifiers.text: (0.4-0.6)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You lose all Endurance Charges when Hit
You gain an Endurance Charge on Kill
You gain Onslaught for 2 seconds per Endurance Charge when Hit

lines.flavourText: "When your back is against the wall,|And your opponent is bleeding you dry,|There is only one appropriate response:|Unbridled, overwhelming violence."|- Daresso, the Sword King

lines.name: The Beast Fur Shawl

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Area of Effect of Area Skills

lines.flavourText: The quickest way to understand|your own strengths and weaknesses|is to walk in the skin of another.

lines.name: The Covenant

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 15 Added Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText: My Soul is your Strength|My Price is your Blood

lines.name: Voll's Protector

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Power Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText: Although a great leader during the war,|Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.

lines.name: The Coming Calamity

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Herald Gems
35% chance to avoid being Stunned for each Herald Skill affecting you
Mana Reservation of Herald Skills is always 45%

lines.flavourText: Whiff of cold, tiny spark, faintest flicker in the dark.|Embers swirl, ice takes form, sky exposed - Death's perfect storm.|Frost and thunder, flames shine bright, ruin walks the land tonight.|By your hand they dance and bend, wield them and brook no end.

lines.name: Lightning Coil

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (20-30) Lightning Damage to Attacks
30% of Physical Damage taken as Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText: "There's nothing like imminent death|to galvanize one's purpose in life."|- Malachai the Soulless.

lines.name: Cospri's Will

explicitModifiers.text: Your Curses can apply to Hexproof Enemies
60% chance to Poison on Hit against Cursed Enemies

lines.flavourText: Curse their vile Council,|They cast me aside as if I am some bastard child.|If they only knew the power I possess.

lines.name: Ashrend

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 10 Added Fire Damage
(10-15)% increased Physical Damage with Ranged Weapons

lines.flavourText: The blasted oak stands forever.

lines.name: Ylfeban's Trickery

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 10 Shock Ground when Hit
Adds 1 to (60-80) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks
20% chance to Curse non-Cursed Enemies with a random Curse on Hit

lines.flavourText: An angry god is one thing, |but you should really fear a god |with an unpredictable sense of humour.

lines.name: Death's Door

explicitModifiers.text: 50% increased Elemental Ailment Duration on You

lines.flavourText: To extend your life as long as possible|is to extend all the maladies that come with it.

lines.name: Null and Void

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Immunity to Physical Damage for 1.5 seconds on Rampage

lines.flavourText: What is freedom but a clean slate|in an unclean world?

lines.name: Kaom's Heart
lines.flavourText: The warrior who|fears will fall.

lines.name: Briskwrap
lines.flavourText: "I carry neither food nor drink. I rely on the charity|of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men."|- Taruk of the Wildmen

lines.name: Cloak of Flame

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 15 Fire Damage to Melee Attackers
20% of Physical Damage taken as Fire Damage

lines.flavourText: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.

lines.name: Abberath's Hooves

explicitModifiers.text: When you Kill an Ignited Enemy, inflict an equivalent Ignite on each nearby Enemy
Casts level 7 Abberath's Fury when equipped

lines.flavourText: The Goat King knew not of war,|of the lands and laws he trampled.|The Goat King knew only joy|at turning life to ash.

lines.name: Seven-League Step
lines.flavourText: "Death can be outrun with these, but beware!|In running from death, you may forget to live."|- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 202

lines.name: Scold's Bridle

explicitModifiers.text: Your Skills deal you 400% of Mana Spent as Physical Damage

lines.flavourText: "The sharper the pain, the sharper the mind. |A curious paradox."	|- Shavronne of Umbra

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour
lines.flavourText: "When you have nothing to hide,|you have nothing to fear."|- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Shadows and Dust

Creates a Smoke Cloud on Rampage
Gain Unholy Might for 3 seconds on Rampage

lines.flavourText: What is fear but a snuffed torch|and death in the wind?

lines.name: Atziri's Splendour
lines.flavourText: "When you have nothing to hide,|you have nothing to fear."|- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 40 Lightning Damage to Attacks
100% chance on Block to create Consecrated Ground

lines.flavourText: When dead men rise and darkness falls|Only faith can be your walls|Walls of Light, not of brick|Twice as strong and twice as thick

lines.name: Ahn's Heritage

explicitModifiers.text: +3% to all maximum Resistances while you have no Endurance Charges
You have Onslaught while at maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText: "It's not Karui, Azmeri or even Vaal in origin,|but one thing is certain. It is very, very old."|- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 46

lines.name: Speaker's Wreath

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Minion Attack Speed per 50 Dexterity
2% increased Minion Movement Speed per 50 Dexterity
Minions' Hits can only Kill Ignited Enemies

lines.flavourText: A strong pair of legs may carry you far,|but a silver tongue and a few brutes|can take you to the edge of the world.

lines.name: The Embalmer

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 20 Vile Toxins

lines.flavourText: "Decomposition takes hold too quickly!|No, if we are to keep the specimen in perfect shape,|we must begin the process before expiry."

lines.name: Dendrobate

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Lesser Poison
(75-100)% increased Damage with Poison if you have at least 300 Dexterity
(15-25)% increased Poison Duration at least 150 Intelligence
(15-25)% increased Poison Duration if you have at least 150 Intelligence

lines.flavourText: Ask any tracker and they'll tell you:|the most dangerous animals|are the ones who don't bother to hide.

lines.name: The Coming Calamity

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Herald Gems
35% chance to avoid being Stunned for each Herald Skill affecting you
Mana Reservation of Herald Skills is always 45%

lines.flavourText: Whiff of cold, tiny spark, faintest flicker in the dark.|Embers swirl, ice takes form, sky exposed - Death's perfect storm.|Frost and thunder, flames shine bright, ruin walks the land tonight.|By your hand they dance and bend, wield them and brook no end.

lines.name: Lioneye's Paws

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 12 to 24 Fire Damage to Attacks
40% reduced Movement Speed when on Low Life
Cannot be Stunned when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Stand and lead the righteous pride,|Fight till death, never hide.

lines.name: Veruso's Battering Rams

explicitModifiers.text: 4% increased Melee Damage per Endurance Charge
You cannot be Shocked while at maximum Endurance Charges

lines.flavourText: With unending determination and resolve he destroyed first the gates, |then the constructs guarding the tomb on the other side.

lines.name: Atziri's Mirror

explicitModifiers.text: 50% reduced Duration of Curses on you
10% additional Block chance while not Cursed
20% additional Spell Block chance while Cursed

lines.flavourText: "As long as I see death in my mirror, so will Wraeclast."|- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Kaltenhalt

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (10-15)% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
Reflects (25-50) Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText: Cold, miserable and alone... but alive.

lines.name: Doedre's Scorn

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
(10-20)% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments per Curse on Enemy

lines.flavourText: A scar of the flesh you'll never forget,|A scar of the mind you'll never remember.

lines.name: Foxshade

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 5 to 12 Physical Damage to Attacks
You gain 500 Evasion Rating when on Full Life

lines.flavourText: To catch an animal, think like an animal.

lines.name: Chalice of Horrors

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
10% Chance to Cause Monster to Flee on Block

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye. A curse for a curse.

lines.name: Rime Gaze

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 20 Concentrated Effect

lines.flavourText: The malice in her gaze froze blood and shattered bone.

lines.name: Slitherpinch

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText: A soft caress in dead of night,|that slips about the neck, so tight.

lines.name: Ashrend

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 10 Added Fire Damage
(10-15)% increased Physical Damage with Ranged Weapons

lines.flavourText: The blasted oak stands forever.

lines.name: Bramblejack

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 2 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
40% of Melee Physical Damage taken reflected to Attacker

lines.flavourText: It is safer to be feared than to be loved.

lines.name: Kingsguard

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100 Life when an Endurance Charge expires or is consumed

lines.flavourText: The toughest armour is the trust of your people.

lines.name: Cloak of Flame

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 15 Fire Damage to Melee Attackers
20% of Physical Damage taken as Fire Damage

lines.flavourText: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.

lines.name: Malachai's Simula
lines.flavourText: It was a sliver of Malachai's soul|that animated the first Eternal Guardian.

lines.name: Deerstalker

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 11 Trap
15% increased Movement Speed for 9 seconds on Throwing a Trap

lines.flavourText: Anticipation, preparation, exhilaration, celebration.

lines.name: Heatshiver

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Cold Damage if you have used a Fire Skill Recently
(20-30)% increased Fire Damage if you have used a Cold Skill Recently

lines.flavourText: Give of your heated passions.|Give of your cold resolve.|You will be repaid.

lines.name: Matua Tupuna

explicitModifiers.text: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
10% increased Effect of Auras on You
10% increased Effect of Auras on your Minions
Spreads Tar when you take a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText: You carried me through life,|The least I can do is carry you through death.

lines.name: The Restless Ward

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Movement Speed per Frenzy Charge
(20-30) Life Regenerated per second per Endurance Charge
100% increased Endurance, Frenzy and Power Charge Duration

lines.flavourText: Use the dead to stave off death,|An armour of bones and rot.|Hanging on with bated breath,|One lapse and all for naught.

lines.name: Thousand Teeth Temu

explicitModifiers.text: 0.4% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Reflects 1 to 1000 Physical Damage to Attackers on Block
10% of Damage you Reflect to Enemies is gained as Life

lines.flavourText: Crimson burn'd the star of sadness,|All was woe that seem'd but gladness.

lines.name: Daresso's Courage

explicitModifiers.text: 120% of Block Chance applied to Spells when on Low Life
20% chance to Block Attacks if you have Blocked a Spell Recently
20% chance to Block Spells if you have Blocked an Attack Recently

lines.flavourText: By tourney's end, Daresso bled and shivered.|Yet even accursed treachery failed to steal the champion's victory.

lines.name: Briskwrap
lines.flavourText: "I carry neither food nor drink. I rely on the charity|of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men."|- Taruk of the Wildmen

lines.name: Craghead

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks with Bows

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 6 to 10 Physical Damage to Attacks with Bows

lines.flavourText: Hit them hard. Hit them once.

lines.name: Dusktoe

explicitModifiers.text: +50% to Chaos Resistance while using a Flask
Adds (15-20) to (25-30) Chaos Damage to Spells and Attacks while using a Flask

lines.flavourText: "A lick of shadow may ease |the petty frictions of one's life."|- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Ezomyte Peak
lines.flavourText: Centuries of servitude, a day|of glory, an eternity of death.

lines.name: Honourhome

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 13 Lightning Damage to Attacks
+20% to all Elemental Resistances while on Low Life
20% reduced Mana Cost of Skills when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: "The craven mind is sharp with self interest.|The honourable mind is much easier to manipulate."| - Malachai the Soulless

lines.name: Maligaro's Lens

explicitModifiers.text: 10% increased Area of Effect of Area Skills
Nearby allies Recover 2% of your maximum Life when you Die

lines.flavourText: "Look around you. What do you see? |Corruption, perversion, sin?|No. It is progress. |You simply lack the means to see it." |- Inquisitor Maligaro

lines.name: Shackles of the Wretched

explicitModifiers.text: Curses in this item are reflected back to you
You cannot be Chilled for 3 seconds after being Chilled
You cannot be Frozen for 3 seconds after being Frozen
You cannot be Ignited for 3 seconds after being Ignited
You cannot be Shocked for 3 seconds after being Shocked
You grant (4-6) Frenzy Charges to allies on Death

lines.flavourText: Captivity breeds creativity.

lines.name: The Broken Crown

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by level 20 Cast on Death
20% increased Damage when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Every rule has an exception.

lines.name: The Three Dragons

explicitModifiers.text: Your Fire Damage can Shock but not Ignite
Your Cold Damage can Ignite but not Freeze or Chill
Your Lightning Damage can Freeze but not Shock

lines.flavourText: "The ice seared his naked feet|As the lightning stilled his heart,|But it was the flames upon his lover's face|That roused him to vengeance."|- From 'The Three Dragons' by Victario of Sarn

lines.name: Thousand Ribbons

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by level 5 Elemental Proliferation
Adds 2 to 3 Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds 2 to 3 Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds 1 to 4 Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

lines.flavourText: The night of a thousand ribbons|To remember the day of a thousand flames|When Sarn burned|And was born again

lines.name: Veil of the Night

explicitModifiers.text: Reflects 1 to (180-220) Lightning Damage to Attackers on Block

lines.flavourText: The seeds of greatness are planted in darkness,|Watered by suffering,|Tended by desperation,|And bloom steel flowers of victory.

lines.name: Voll's Protector

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Power Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText: Although a great leader during the war,|Voll proved disastrous in times of peace.

lines.name: Wondertrap

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Rarity of Items found when on Low Life

lines.flavourText: Wonders abound at death's door.
